title: MSc. Human Centered Artificial Intelligence | Technological University Dublin
description: Currently pursuing Master's in Human-Centered Artificial Intelligence with focus on Machine Learning and Neural Networks, eager to contribute to building safe and beneficial AI systems. The program combines technical AI expertise with human-centered design principles, covering areas such as machine learning, neural networks, AI ethics, and responsible AI development.
